name: Agent Two
description:
for the UGJ game jam 2020

a game starring two agents, with two colours.

HOW TO PLAY

each agent wants to move to its respective coloured door, but can only move on the opposite coloured tile. you can click on the tiles to change their colour, however if the two agents see each other, ie are on the same group of tiles, they will die and you will loose

credits to Jaydenn Bradford for the music, and to Nate Hally for the font
